docs.snippet: Companies have started to introduce some intriguing sports devices that analyze movement using sensors....
docs.lead_paragraph: Companies have started to introduce some intriguing sports devices that analyze movement using sensors.
docs.abstract: Josh Dean State of the Art column observes companies are introducing some intriguing smart sports devices that analyze movement using sensors; notes gadgets put digital coach into user's pocket, transmitting data in real time to app, which then breaks down that information.

headline.main: Digital Coach Perched Right in Your Pocket
headline.print_headline: Digital Coach Perched Right in Your Pocket

docs.snippet: South Carolina's Steve Spurrier has received a one-year contract extension and a raise that will pay the coach $4 million annually....
docs.lead_paragraph: South Carolina's Steve Spurrier has received a one-year contract extension and a raise that will pay the coach $4 million annually.

docs.snippet: David Samson’s role in the aftermath of the bridge scandal and his ties to Gov. Chris Christie, who appointed him, are expected to receive close scrutiny by a new investigative panel....
docs.lead_paragraph: David Samson’s role in the aftermath of the bridge scandal and his ties to Gov. Chris Christie, who appointed him, are expected to receive close scrutiny by a new investigative panel.
docs.abstract: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey chief David Samson’s role in aftermath of George Washington Bridge scandal, and his ties to New Jersey Gov Chris Christie, who appointed him, are expected to receive close scrutiny by investigative panel; days of Samson's preference for maintaining low profile are likely over.

headline.main: As Inquiry Widens, Port Authority Chief May Lose His Low Profile
headline.print_headline: As Inquiry Widens, Port Authority Chief May Lose His Low Profile

keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
keywords.name: organizations

byline.original: By RUSS BUETTNER and WILLIAM K. RASHBAUM

docs.snippet: The Brazilian elite see favela-dwelling vagrants. I see ordinary teenagers....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Brazilian elite see favela-dwelling vagrants. I see ordinary teenagers.
docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by Brazilian journalist Vanessa Barbara describes 'rolezinho' phenomenon in Sao Paulo, Brazil, in which teenagers gather at shopping malls to hang out, take pictures and engage in minor acts of rebellion; points to class issues stirred up by events, wherein elite see threatening vagrants and others see ordinary teenagers.

docs.snippet: Being a little bit more rock'n'roll than country, I had never considered putting a country-fried city like Nashville on my travel bucket list. Yet here I was, standing in a strip mall parking lot in Music City on a chilly Sunday afternoon, outside...
docs.lead_paragraph: Being a little bit more rock'n'roll than country, I had never considered putting a country-fried city like Nashville on my travel bucket list. Yet here I was, standing in a strip mall parking lot in Music City on a chilly Sunday afternoon, outside The Bluebird Cafe.

headline.main: 'Nashville' TV Show Fans Will Love Real Music City
headline.print_headline: 'Nashville' TV Show Fans Will Love Real Music City
